title: Update 11 keeps failing
content: I've just purchased a Pixel 3a XL and really struggling to update to version 11.  I've tried 4 times, each time it takes approximately 40minites and then receive a notification saying it's failed to update.  I recently update my Pixel 2 with no issues and cannot see what I'm doing different.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
